data.text: @viralpatel80 @cathaypacificIN Hi there, we have responded to you through Facebook. To avoid duplicate response, we will relied you only through Facebook. Thanks for your understanding! - Liz
@IanMunday6 We are sorry about that :( Can you provide us with your eTicket number and passenger name through DM so we can check on this for you?- Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

@Cavite2020 Hi there, could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?
@satishkumar432 Hi there, apologies for the wait as we are experiencing high volumes right now. May you please share your eTicket number and passenger name so we can check on this for you? - Liz
@jgsze Yes, you may. But if your ticket was purchase from the travel agency, please contact them for further assist -Elsa

@n3iL07 @cathaypacificIN Hi there, apologies to have kept you waiting as we are experiencing high volumes currently. Could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?

@sinaril1 Hong Kong is the only layover city for our flights as we're a Hong Kong-based company. Please share your eTicket no and full name in DM so we can further assist. - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@JagrutZaveri @Cleartrip Hi there, could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?
@jangibo94 Hi there, could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?

@themajorgamery Hi there, could you please DM us your full name, 13 digit e-ticket number or 6-digit booking reference for checking?

@ricomambo715 Please kindly share your eTicket no and full name in DM. - Chloe https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@anna_grace_ Hi there, apologies for the wait as we are experiencing high volumes right now. We have just relied you through DM. Please check. Thank you! - Liz
@hankdevjr Hi there, mind letting us know which period you are looking for in DM so that we can further assist? - Holly https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

data.text:
@elbarnador Passengers who meet one or more of the following criteria are not permitted to enter Japan:
Travelling on a People’s Republic of China passport that lists Hubei Province as the place of issue.
Visited the Hubei Province in the past 14 days.
- Liz
@jcgozar Hi there, the refund process may takes up to 21 business days and the refundable amount will return back to your original payment method. - Liz
@Bre04106692 Hi there, may you share your eTicket number and passenger name through DM for checking please? - Liz https://t.co/6IweuRCstB

Thanks for bearing with us! - Holly

@Eneceee Hi there, sorry for the wait. It will take approximately 14 working days for our customer relations team to handle your case and we have urged them for you.  Since we are receiving a huge amount of message recently, it will take longer time for us to get back to you. - Holly

entity.name: United joins Delta and American in halting flights to China due to the coronavirus
entity.description: After earlier announcements from Delta Air Lines and American Airlines, United Airlines confirmed it is temporarily suspending flights from its hub cities to three Chinese cities from February 6 until March 28. On Friday, Delta Air Lines announced that it will suspend flights to and from China from February 6 to April 30. American Airlines similarly suspended its flights from January 31 through March 27.

data.text: @YeeSuenLee Hi Yee-Suen, currently, non-US citizens or residents who have visited mainland China within the last 14 days are not permitted to enter the United States. There are certain exemptions to this, which you can find on our travel restrictions page: https://t.co/B3esr286AP - Devin
@komalmirani18 Hi there. Sorry to keep you waiting as teams are now handling mass of enquiries. Mind letting us know your eTicket number and full name for checking please? Thanks. - Anna
@theblondwombat Yes. - Chloe
@Thoooms Hi there. Mind providing us your eTicket number and full name through DM for checking please? Thanks. - Anna https://t.co/6IweuRCstB
@jj_comeau Hi there. Sorry to keep you waiting since teams are handling mass of enquiries. We replied and provided assist in private message. Hope for understanding and patience. - Anna
@Ramonido Hi there. There is no cancellation waiver for the flights from/to or via Hong Kong. Latest information can be referred to our website at https://t.co/CflKpDUZf0 - Anna
